Ok… so using google Translate I managed to get a rough idea about what happened in the final few pages, ( I think cause somehow Chinese is easier than jap to translate in google). The big guy eventually wants to make the girl his only woman and not to share with anyone else. This is more apparent a few chapters ago when he beat that guy up for suggesting sharing her with his friends. So I think he is just a good guy who genuinely cares for the main girl. The main girl decides to finically face the facts and decides to let go of her feelings for the main MC, thinking he deserves better than a slut like her. So in all retrospect, 8 would say it’s not a bad ending but not a good one either. It’s a nice change that the guy she is fucking isn’t a total asshole. He just falls into the misconception of a delinquent stereotype. In a way you could say Early bird catches the worm.

If you want to fuck someone, then you fuck him. Thinking of another person while fucking another is the most pathetic thing I have ever seen. But hey, that tells us she's still in love with the MC.
